document.heading: Authorization to Enter an Interstate Corrections Compact Temporary Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-230, the “Authorization to Enter an Interstate Corrections Compact Temporary Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-542. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 12, 1988, and September 27, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 13, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-242 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. Law 7-230 became effective May 10, 1989.
